meta.description: Optimize the operation of a bakery to maximize total profit from bread and cookies production.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: Types of products produced by the bakery.

params.name: mixer_time
params.description: Time required in the stand mixer for each product.

params.name: oven_time
params.description: Time required in the oven for each product.

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per unit of each product.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units produced for each product.

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.description: Maximize total profit from bread and cookies.

constraints.name: mixer_capacity
constraints.description: Total mixer time cannot exceed 3000 hours.

constraints.name: oven_capacity
constraints.description: Total oven time cannot exceed 3000 hours.
